question:
With reference to the recent decision to abolish the anti-dumping duty on purified terephthalic acid (PTA), consider the following statements:
  1. It is used in the manufacturing of plastics.
  2. The move will decrease the price of manufacturing polyester based fabrics.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The purified terephthalic acid is an organic compound used in the manufacturing of plastics. Its major use is as a raw material in the manufacturing of PET (polyethylene terephthalate) plastics. The government announced the decision to remove the anti-dumping duty on the PTA import ‘in public interest’. Statement 2 is correct: The PTA is used as a major raw material in manufacturing polyesters. Nearly 80% of the polyester products are manufactured from PTA. The removal of the anti-dumping duty will encourage the manufacturers to source PTA from cheaper imports thus reducing the cost of manufacturing.
